languages.text: "Единственная, кто здесь действительно любил Денза, — его внучка, Аделия Беллардо. Ей и достанется наследство".

traits.locale_text: "Единственная, кто здесь действительно любил Денза, — его внучка, Аделия Беллардо. Ей и достанется наследство".

languages.text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."
languages.original_text: "Единственная, кто здесь действительно любил Денза, — его внучка, Аделия Беллардо. Ей и достанется наследство".

traits.locale_text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."
"The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."
"The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

"The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

languages.text: 「デンツを本当に愛していたのは、孫娘のアデリア・ベラルドだけだ。彼の財産を相続するのは彼女だ」
languages.original_text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

traits.locale_text: 「デンツを本当に愛していたのは、孫娘のアデリア・ベラルドだけだ。彼の財産を相続するのは彼女だ」

languages.text: “这里唯一真正爱着丹兹的人，是他的孙女阿德莉雅·贝拉多。她应该继承她祖父的遗产。”
languages.original_text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

traits.locale_text: “这里唯一真正爱着丹兹的人，是他的孙女阿德莉雅·贝拉多。她应该继承她祖父的遗产。”

languages.text: « La seule personne ici qui ait aimé Denz était sa petite-fille, Adélia Bellardo. C'est elle qui doit hériter de sa fortune. »
languages.original_text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

traits.locale_text: « La seule personne ici qui ait aimé Denz était sa petite-fille, Adélia Bellardo. C'est elle qui doit hériter de sa fortune. »

languages.text: «La única de los presentes que de verdad amaba a Denz es su nieta, Adelia Bellardo. Será ella quien herede su fortuna».
languages.original_text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

traits.locale_text: «La única de los presentes que de verdad amaba a Denz es su nieta, Adelia Bellardo. Será ella quien herede su fortuna».

languages.text: "Die Einzige hier, die Denz wirklich geliebt hat, ist seine Enkelin, Adelia Bellardo. Sie erbt sein Vermögen."
languages.original_text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

traits.locale_text: "Die Einzige hier, die Denz wirklich geliebt hat, ist seine Enkelin, Adelia Bellardo. Sie erbt sein Vermögen."

languages.text: "Burada Denz'i gerçekten seven tek kişi, torunu Adelia Bellardo'ydu. Mirası da o alacak."
languages.original_text: "The only one here who truly loved Denz is his granddaughter, Adelia Bellardo. She inherits his fortune."

traits.locale_text: "Burada Denz'i gerçekten seven tek kişi, torunu Adelia Bellardo. Mirası o almalı."
